resources.string: This game includes levels from 6 to 20. Each level indicating number of digits in that level.
For each level you will be provided with 3 lives.
If any user exhaust his/her all 3 lives then next game will start.
Answer should be in the same sequence as they are displayed.
This game includes levels from 6 to 20. Each level indicating number of digits in that level.
For each level you will be provided with 3 lives.
If any user exhaust his/her all 3 lives then next game will start.
Answer should be in the same sequence as they are displayed not what you hear(distraction).
This game includes levels from 6 to 20. Each level indicating number of digits in that level.
For each level you will be provided with 3 lives.
If any user exhaust his/her all 3 lives then next game will start.
Answer should be in the same sequence as the sound comes out.
This game includes levels from 6 to 20. Each level indicating number of digits in that level.
For each level you will be provided with 3 lives.
If any user exhaust his/her all 3 lives then next game will start.
Answer should be in the same sequence as they are shown.
